title: Audion & On
itunes:title: Audion & On
author: podcasting@panic.com (Panic)
description: How did a fierce competition with a rival lead Steven Frank and Cabel Sasser to make a life-changing decision in a meeting with one of their biggest idols... and one of their arch nemeses?
content:encoded:
How did a fierce competition with a rival lead Steven Frank and Cabel Sasser to make a life-changing decision in a meeting with one of their biggest idols… and one of their arch nemeses?

Show Notes

  • Capture of the Audion Faces page from February 2001
  • Cabel’s 2004 blog post on the story (and retirement) of Audion
  • Welcome to Macintosh Episode 12: Don’t Panic
  • SoundJam MP
  • Casady & Greene
  • Felt Tip Software
  • Jeremy Bailey on Twitter
  • Jake Rodkin on Twitter
  • Wade Cosgrove on Twitter
  • Dan Messing on Twitter
  • Michael Buckley’s website
  • Try the Audion web player built by Michael Buckley
itunes:author: Panic
itunes:subtitle: Community, and the cascading effects of the choices we make
itunes:summary: How did a fierce competition with a rival lead Steven Frank and Cabel Sasser to make a life-changing decision in a meeting with one of their biggest idols... and one of their arch nemeses?
